sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq , gubun , title , location , nation , city , price , TO_CHAR(sdate, 'yy"년 "mm"월 "dd"일 "') sdate , TO_CHAR(edate, 'yy"년 "mm"월 "dd"일 "') edate , DECODE(use,'Y',('사용'),('중지')) use , rdate FROM goods
WHERE 1=1
AND $searchCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY rdate DESC ) a ) b WHERE rn >= #firstIndex# AND rn <= #lastIndex#
